title: ZK I Zettel 5,16 (2) - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
5,16
					Kontrolldichte           vgl. auch span of control Lit.Gouldner, S. 87ff., 159ff., 176ff.Daniel Katz / Robert Kahn, Human Organization andWorker Motivation, in: Industrial Productivity, ed.by L. Reed Tripp, Madison (Wisc.) 1951, pp. 146-171
